name: Megaton: Total Destruction
description: Guilt free destruction of beautiful cities around the world! With an unique armory of insane explosive projectiles to choose from, destruction has never been so fun!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Processor Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX680 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
